programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Salido vs. Lopez II (R) (?)
Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a publicity stunt brings the New York Rangers and the national spotlight to Mystery, Alaska for a game against the local team of weekend warriors, the town rises to meet the challenge of a lifetime. Russell Crowe, Hank Azaria, and Burt Reynolds lead an all-star cast

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: An ambitious ghost writer (Ewan McGregor) is hired to pen the forthcoming autobiography of a controversial former British prime minister (Pierce Brosnan) but uncovers an incendiary secret from his subject's past that indicates a vast global conspiracy is controlling world events. Olivia Williams costars in this tense thriller from director Roman Polanski

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Wilder vs. Szpilka (R) (?)
Breach

When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: The grisly influence of the fiendish serial killer Jigsaw is felt from beyond the grave in this fifth installment of the horror franchise, which finds one of the murderer's survivors teaming up with the murderer's most promising protege. Costas Mandylor and Scott Patterson star with Tobin Bell

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students, and places them on a on a desert island where they are forced to fight each other to death or all of them will be killed

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a publicity stunt brings the New York Rangers and the national spotlight to Mystery, Alaska for a game against the local team of weekend warriors, the town rises to meet the challenge of a lifetime. Russell Crowe, Hank Azaria, and Burt Reynolds lead an all-star cast

programme.title: Alexandre Dumas' The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: When the young and dashing Edmond Dantes (Jim Caviezel) is betrayed by his best friend (Guy Pearce) and falsely imprisoned, he becomes consumed by thoughts of vengeance. After a miraculous escape, he transforms himself into the mysterious and wealthy Count of Monte Cristo, insinuates himself into the French nobility and uses a hidden treasure to put his plan of revenge in action

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Awards® winners Billy Bob Thornton and Dennis Quaid star in this historical epic set in 19th century Texas during the famed siege of Alamo, where a group of men led by Colonel Travis, along with Davey Crockett and Jim Bowie, fought against the odds, for the independence of Texas

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: The Program
programme.desc: A group of young athletes come together from different worlds in this gritty, action-packed story of Top 10 college football, where talent unites them, competition divides them and their demanding coach stands by them, even when they fall. Stars James Caan and Halle Berry

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: A Civil Action
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as Jan Schlichtmann, a cynical, high-priced personal injury attorney who only takes big-money cases he can safely settle out of court. Though his latest case appears straightforward, Jan soon becomes entangled in an epic legal battle on behalf of his clients - one where he's willing to put his career, reputation and all that he owns on the line. Robert Duvall, William H. Macy and John Lithgow co-star

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this remake of the action classic about a lethal assassin who travels to Bangkok to perform a quartet of hits but falls in love with a beautiful, deaf pharmacist, and takes a young hustler under his wing as a protege. Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller(n)

programme.title: Sorority Sex House
programme.desc: When a hard-partying frat on campus is forced by the assistant dean to share their house with a sorority or face ejection from school, the boys wage an epic battle of the sexes to fight for their right to party(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Open Water 2: Adrift
programme.desc: A group of four friends who rent a luxury yacht for a weekend of sun and sailing find themselves in a nightmare scenario when they are left floating in the ocean as their vessel drifts out of reach - with one stranded mother's newborn infant on board alone. Eric Dane, Susan May Pratt, Ali Hillis and Niklaus Lange star in this taut thriller(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: A vengeful spirit takes the form of the Tooth Fairy to destroy the inhabitants of a town that lynched her 150 years earlier(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star(n)

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy(n)

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite. Jeffrey Jones, Andy Milonakis and Faizon Love costar in this hilarious comedy of golf, rap, and class tension

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up(n)

programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: From legendary filmmaker Steven Spielberg comes an epic film that chronicles the untold story of the final four months of the man regarded as America's greatest President. Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as the commander-in-chief of a country in chaos: a man with moral courage and a progressive thinker who challenged the status quo. Featuring an all-star cast including Sally Field, Tommy Lee Jones and James Spader(n)

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: Lesson Number One
programme.desc: In episode 407, Jenny's short story about her friends sparks interest from Hollywood; Helena struggles to pay back her poker debt; Alice's new girlfriend Tasha experiences flashbacks to the war in Iraq; Bette and her new girlfriend console Phyllis

programme.title: Lexington And Concord
programme.desc: In episode 408, Jenny's revenge on her critic backfires in front of her agents; Alice and Tasha disagree over the war in Iraq but find common ground romantically; Tina meets Bette's new girlfriend Jodi; Kit unloads publicly on the cheating Angus(c)

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: A vengeful spirit takes the form of the Tooth Fairy to destroy the inhabitants of a town that lynched her 150 years earlier

programme.title: Coffee and Cigarettes
programme.desc: Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett, Steve Buscemi, Iggy Pop, Jack and Meg White, Tom Waits, Steven Wright and Roberto Benigni are part of the eccentric cast appearing in this series of 11 wry, short films by filmmaker Jim Jarmusch, shot over a period of 17 years. Linking this lyrical and leisurely collection of black-and-white vignettes is the ubiquitous presence of a cup of joe and a ciggie, some great background music (often heard from diner jukeboxes) and an inextinguishable sense of cool. "Plays like a haunting concept album" - "Rolling Stone."

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: Lacy Lilting Lyrics
programme.desc: In episode 409, Tina and Jenny have creative differences over the development of their movie; Alice and her friends console Phyllis's heartbroken husband; Bette and Jodi's relationship might go to the next level if Bette can curb her Type-A personality(c)

programme.title: Little Boy Blue
programme.desc: In episode 410, Kit binge-drinks while Angus tries to apologize for his infidelity; Alice finds investors in her blog, but with strings attached that involve Jenny, who finds the perfect director for her movie; Bette's control issues make an ugly appearance(c)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Sam (Chris Pine) is a twenty-something, fast-talking salesman whose latest deal collapses the day he learns his father has suddenly died. Against his wishes, Sam is called home to put his father's estate in order and reconnect with his estranged family. While there, he uncovers a startling secret that turns his entire world upside down - he has a 30-year-old sister (Elizabeth Banks) he never knew existed. Michelle Pfeiffer and Oliva Wilde co-star in this smart and witty drama

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Toula's family throws an even bigger Greek wedding for her parents, who learn they never officially tied the knot. Meanwhile, she tries to spice up her own marriage and deals with a daughter who's eager to escape from her overbearing clan. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Vice
programme.sub-title: Future of Firearms & Russia 'Wins' Climate Change
programme.desc: A look at the evolution of the firearms industry in the U.S. amid a fundamentally changed political landscape; a report on the potential economic blessing for Russia as world temperatures rise and Arctic sea ice melts. (cc)

programme.title: Looking The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Girl 6
programme.desc: Comedy about an unemployed actress who finds that her talents come in handy when she goes to work for a phone-sex company. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: A somber vampire mesmerizes a young reporter with the story of his ghastly transformation from grieving aristocrat to immortal monster, beginning in 18th-century New Orleans with his first encounters with the charismatic and decadent bloodsucker Lestat. The two vamps remain deeply, if reluctantly, connected over the years, while becoming intimately involved with others of their kind, including a mature immortal in a young child's body. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A dangerous sniper traps a self-centered NYC publicist in a public phone booth. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Rosewood
programme.desc: Powerful dramatization of events leading to the obliteration of a black community by an angry mob in 1923 Florida. Jon Voight, Ving Rhames. Sylvester: Don Cheadle. Sarah: Esther Rolle. Scrappie: Elise Neal. Sheriff Walker: Michael Rooker. Directed by John Singleton. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. (cc)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck pals become arms dealers, but get in over their heads when they land a $300 million contract with the U.S. government to supply weaponry to forces in Afghanistan. Based on true events. (cc)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman's Show
programme.desc: Two naive Americans visit London; a topless Sally Preston holds her first meeting with constituents; Judi Dench sneaks into a movie theater; a man pitches his latest idea for a weather app; a modeling agent does her best to scout new faces. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Batman v Superman Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman and Superman clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world, while the public they're defending is becoming increasingly mindful of the damage that superheroes and masked vigilantes cause. However, the duo are soon forced to confront an even greater threat created by nefarious billionaire Lex Luthor. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Huntsman Winter's War
programme.desc: This spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Sister Act 2 Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Sequel in which Deloris reunites with her sisters to teach music at an inner-city school and save it from being shut down. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver's satirical look at the previous week's news, politics and headlines. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realization that they scared away a friend's fiancée, two hard-partying pals set out on a wild journey to Mexico to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Good Guy
programme.desc: A young New Yorker (Alexis Bledel) is searching for the perfect career, social life and man. Although she falls for a Wall Street big shot (Scott Porter) who seems like the answer to her prayers, she also finds herself attracted to his handsome coworker (Bryan Greenberg) and realizes that love is as big a gamble as the stock market. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Toenail
programme.desc: An ambitious yuppie must care for his ailing father on the eve of a big promotion. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: After witnessing her gangster boyfriend commit a murder, lounge singer Deloris evades capture and the police hide her in a convent. While adjusting to her new conditions, Deloris helps transform the choir, thus attracting a lot of attention. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Making of 'Race'
programme.desc: A look at "Race," a 2016 drama about track-and-field legend Jesse Owens and his performance at the 1936 Summer Olympics in Berlin. The film stars Stephan James, Jason Sudeikis and Jeremy Irons, and is directed by Stephen Hopkins. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Kevin Costner as an ex-Secret Service agent who falls for the pop diva (Whitney Houston) he's hired to protect. Despite the farfetched premise, the movie was a hit with audiences. The splendid soundtrack includes the hit song "I Will Always Love You." Written by Lawrence Kasdan, who penned the script in 1975 as a vehicle for Steve McQueen. Costner co-produced. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger woos a young woman and brings her to his mansion atop a clay mountain. There, she learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets as she fights for her sanity and her very life. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A look at the evolution of the firearms industry in the U.S. amid a fundamentally changed political landscape; a report on the potential economic blessing for Russia as world temperatures rise and Arctic sea ice melts. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Assassins
programme.desc: A cynical and burned-out hitman falls in love with the target of his final assignment, and has to deal with a hotshot young gun who wants to prove his greatness by taking the old-man out. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: A betrayed mob hit man goes the lam with his son, and seeks revenge against vicious gangsters. As the bullets start to fly, the impressionable child is exposed to the goriest aspects of his father's talents. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Term Life
programme.desc: A professional thief takes his estranged daughter on the lam when a job goes awry. As crooks and corrupt cops close in on them, he also takes out a life-insurance policy on himself in an effort to leave something behind for his daughter. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver's satirical look at the previous week's news, politics and headlines. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.desc: A commitment-phobic executive learns that his $100 million inheritance will be voided unless he gets married. While he and his sweetheart had been talking wedding bells, she thinks it's wrong to marry for money. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Sequel in which Bridget worries about her relationship with Darcy and is upset when work reunites her with the womanizing Daniel. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Exhilarating and emotionally powerful Best Picture about an illiterate orphan from the slums of India who is on the verge of winning the ultimate prize on a popular TV quiz show. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love
programme.desc: Best Picture winner is about a fictional romance between a struggling young playwright named Shakespeare and a noblewoman who longs to act, and who inspires him to write "Romeo and Juliet." Gwyneth Paltrow won an Oscar for her role as the muse. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver's satirical look at the previous week's news, politics and headlines. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina's book finally arrives; Jonah has an important meeting; Dan, Ben and Kent go out for drinks. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: Three female friends inadvertently bring the devil to their sleepy New England town. He proceeds to seduce each of them, and the trio must work together again to stop him from his plans for total domination. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a boy named Jake follows a series of clues that lead him to a mysterious orphanage on a remote Welsh island. There, he discovers a community of children with unusual abilities, and learns he is destined to protect them. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organization known as WCKD. (cc)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Contrived thriller about dirty-bomb attacks in Los Angeles that leave a couple quarantined, he (Rory Cochrane) inside their house, she (Mary McCormack) on the outside. Tony Perez. Written and directed by Chris Gorak. (cc)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her diabetic preteen daughter hide in a fortified, high-tech, hidden chamber when thieves break into their New York City home, but more problems arise after they leave behind the girl's medications. (cc)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: Splatterfest about a deranged, hulking psychopath (WWE wrestler Kane) haunting a decrepit hotel. Steven Vidler, Christina Vidal. Directed by Gregory Dark. (cc)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: A lab-created human/alien hybrid goes on a killing spree while searching for a man who can impregnate her. Meanwhile, the scientist responsible for her creation brings together a motley crew in order to stop her. (cc)

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent tries to infiltrate a powerful crime ring. But when a bust goes bad, he lands in the recently reopened, high-tech Alcatraz, where he remains undercover as thieves try to find a cache of stolen gold. (cc)

programme.title: Sgt. Bilko
programme.desc: A conniving army sergeant pulls numerous cons while feuding with one of his former victims who attempts to get him kicked out of the service. (cc)

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: A disgraced basketball coach takes a job at a small Indiana high-school and leads the small squad on an improbable run for a state chamionship. Meanwhile, he helps the town drunk, a former basketball player, redeeem himself. (cc)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: This sports-history saga is the fact-based tale of the Texas Western squad that won the 1966 NCAA basketball championship—the first team to do so starting an all-black lineup. (cc)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to produce and market her invention, the Miracle Mop. The success of that product leads to a home-shopping empire and her ascension to matriarch of her family. (cc)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. (cc)

programme.title: The Rocker
programme.desc: Two decades after being kicked out of a famous heavy-metal group, a failed fortysomething drummer joins his teen nephew's band. Rainn Wilson ("The Office") stars. Christina Applegate, Josh Gad, Teddy Geiger, Emma Stone. Directed by Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty"). (cc)

programme.title: The Mummy Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex. Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army. (cc)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision. (cc)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A member of the future human-resistance movement is teleported back to 1984 L.A. His purpose is to rescue Sarah Connor, the mother of the man who will lead the 21st-century rebels against tyrannical machines, from being killed before she can give birth. Standing in his way is a futuristic cyborg also sent back in time to assassinate the woman. (cc)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: A clan of orc warriors invade the realm of Azeroth after a portal is opened, endangering the humans who already live there. These events lead to a decisive struggle that will decide which race will claim the land. (cc)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion in the Gulf of Mexico that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival. (cc)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship develops between a bigoted Korean War veteran and an Asian teen who, under threat from some gangbangers, tries to steal his car: a cherry 1972 Gran Torino. (cc)

programme.title: The Crew
programme.desc: As they await eviction from a Miami hotel, four retired mobsters try to scare off the other residents by making them an offer they can't refuse. Burt Reynolds, Richard Dreyfuss. Donatelli: Dan Hedaya. Donato: Seymour Cassel. Det. Neal: Carrie-Anne Moss. Ferris: Jennifer Tilly. Directed by Michael Dinner. (cc)

programme.title: The Astronaut's Wife
programme.desc: A woman grows suspicious of her astronaut husband, who acts strangely after a space mission. The film suffers from a slow pace and stiff dialogue. Johnny Depp, Charlize Theron. Written and directed by Rand Ravich. (cc)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: A highly decorated 30-year Marine veteran (Samuel L. Jackson) is put on trial for a rescue mission that went wrong. Good performances, but plot holes abound.Tommy Lee Jones. Directed by William Friedkin. (cc)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: When a Russian mobster creates a crooked real-estate deal, a potential fortune is waiting to be had, and every London thug tries to get a piece of the action. (cc)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: An audacious blend of political satire, drama and action focuses on four GIs in Iraq at the end of the Gulf War who try to steal a cache of gold. George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube, and Spike Jonze star. David O. Russell directed and wrote the script.. (cc)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law). After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective. (cc)

programme.title: Volunteers
programme.desc: A rich kid joins the Peace Corps to escape debt collectors and befriends a virtuous volunteer during a mission to Thailand. Later, the mismatched duo and a female enlistee work together to build a bridge. But guerrillas and black marketeers interfere. (cc)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A Texas congressman uses his influence to supply Afghan fighters with money and arms in their battle against Soviet occupiers in the 1980s. Based on a true story. (cc)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A plane crash leaves a compulsive workaholic stranded on a deserted island for more than four years, where he's forced to adjust to a new life of solitude. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Death row criminal John Coffey has been sentenced for the murders of two innocent girls, but his kind manner doesn't seem to fit the mold of a cold killer. The prison guards soon discover that Coffey seems to have supernatural powers of healing. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: When an aircraft crash-lands in the Sahara, one of the survivors, a German designer, draws up a plan to build a glider from the wreckage. But conflicts beneath the oppressive heat make their chances of success seem slim at best. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Black Salt
programme.desc: An Interpol agent undertakes a mission to recover a deadly weapon of mass destruction. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: A portrait of an irreverent Armed Forces Radio deejay in Saigon during the Vietnam War. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Unlucky-in-love Martha falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While Martha believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau. (cc)(n)

programme.title: On Time
programme.desc: A woman who is running late for a job interview is forced to make a tough decision. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2016 American Black Film Festival. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: An FBI investigator pursues a deranged serial killer, nicknamed "The Tooth Fairy", with the help of his most prolific captured killer. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A brilliant quadriplegic detective forensics expert tracks a serial killer using computer technology, enlisting help from a gifted, but inexperienced rookie. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Blind lawyer Matt Murdock, whose smell, touch, taste and hearing have been heightened as a result of a chemical accident, uses his superpowers to fight crime as the costumed vigilante Daredevil. With the help of Elektra, Murdock takes on mob boss Kingpin and his hired assassin Bullseye. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: A young FBI agent goes undercover to investigate a series of hijackings. Rapidly becoming involved in gang activity, including late-night car races, he begins to relate with his subjects and finds himself falling in love with the gang leader's sister. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Young Stars w Eska TV
programme.desc: W programie prezentowane są utwory najlepszych i najsłynniejszych młodych artystów muzyki polskiej i zagranicznej. Nie zabraknie klipów, takich młodych talentów, jak: S ylwia Przybysz, Shawn Mendes, Jeremi & Artur Sikorscy, Little Mix, Dawid Kwiatkowski, Selena Gomez, Sylwia Lipka, Justin Bieber, Weronika Juszczak i wielu, wielu innych(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: ESKA Music Awards 2017
programme.desc: Uroczysta gala wręczenia nagród szesnastej edycji popularnego plebiscytu. W Szczecinie o wyróżnienia w sześciu kategoriach, m.in. dla najlepszego hitu, artystki i artysty rywalizować będą polscy muzycy, których utwory w minionym roku biły rekordy popularności. Aż cztery nominacje zdobył Kamil Bednarek. Szansę na statuetkę mają też m.in. Agnieszka Chylińska, Sarsa, Mateusz Ziółko, Grzegorz Hyży, Margaret i Mrozu. W Azoty Arenie pojawi się też wielu znakomitych gości. Na scenie wystąpią m.in. takie gwiazdy, jak Matthew Koma, ALMA, Ania Dąbrowska, Monika Lewczuk, Patryk Kumór czy Tom Swoon(n)

programme.title: Wczorajsi - czyli taśmy prawdy
programme.desc: Kamera rejestruje zabawę na imprezach trojga bohaterów odcinka oraz ich przyjaciół. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase

programme.title: Young Stars w Eska TV
programme.desc: W programie prezentowane są utwory najlepszych i najsłynniejszych młodych artystów muzyki polskiej i zagranicznej. Nie zabraknie klipów, takich młodych talentów, jak: S ylwia Przybysz, Shawn Mendes, Jeremi & Artur Sikorscy, Little Mix, Dawid Kwiatkowski, Selena Gomez, Sylwia Lipka, Justin Bieber, Weronika Juszczak i wielu, wielu innych(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: ESKA Music Awards 2017
programme.desc: Uroczysta gala wręczenia nagród szesnastej edycji popularnego plebiscytu. W Szczecinie o wyróżnienia w sześciu kategoriach, m.in. dla najlepszego hitu, artystki i artysty rywalizować będą polscy muzycy, których utwory w minionym roku biły rekordy popularności. Aż cztery nominacje zdobył Kamil Bednarek. Szansę na statuetkę mają też m.in. Agnieszka Chylińska, Sarsa, Mateusz Ziółko, Grzegorz Hyży, Margaret i Mrozu. W Azoty Arenie pojawi się też wielu znakomitych gości. Na scenie wystąpią m.in. takie gwiazdy, jak Matthew Koma, ALMA, Ania Dąbrowska, Monika Lewczuk, Patryk Kumór czy Tom Swoon(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A classic sitcom that reflected the lives of six twentysomething friends: three men and three women, living in New York. A spin-off, `Joey,' featuring Matt LeBlanc's character, was slated to debut in the fall of 2004. (cc)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.sub-title: King of the Links/Leader of the Pack.
programme.desc: Double bill. Les is terrible at sport, except mini-golf. When the school tournament goes wrong, he must choose between the cup and saving the life of his toughest rival

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Last Stall on the Left/Got Stank.
programme.desc: Double bill. New kid Randy Cunningham is the latest in a long line of ninjas who have protected Norrisville High School for 800 years. On his first day at school he faces danger. Randy and Howard try to get themselves into the cool seats for the school game by painting themselves with blue body paint

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Wander gets a cold, so depends on Sylvia to take on his duties. Then, Wander discovers an adorable new species and accidentally exposes them to an entire new world

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Trying to help Spencer get an authentic-sounding scream to use in one of his movies, Billy scares Mallory so badly that she decides to move far away. Then, Spencer wants to buy a piece of horror movie memorabilia, but does not have any money

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When Spencer shoots a Jaws-style movie in his pool, Billy's ectoplasm turns the film's harmless goldfish star into a fearsome aquatic monster. Then, Spencer's sister, Jessica develops a crush on Kleet, and the bully sees an opportunity to spend time at Spencer's house tormenting him

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Mind Games/Strange Kat on a Train.
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop is in trouble for ignoring Millie and is busy trying to stop Kat burying the town under molten lava. Then, Coop and Kat are lured into a trap by an evil alien hamster

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Fangs for the Memories/Drive-in Me Crazy.
programme.desc: Double bill. Dad orders Coop to spend some time with Millie. Then, Coop and Kat destroy the handle of Dad's antique bottle capper during a battle

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: The Prophecy of Hat Sword/Fake Fight for Your Right to Party.
programme.desc: Double bill. Slimovitz threatens to split Randy and Howard up unless they improve their grades. Then, Randy and Howard cause a robot attack while trying to get into a party

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: McCluckbuster's/Let Them Eat Eat Cake Fries.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy and Howard accidentally cause a war between fast food outlets. Then, Slimovitz removes cake-fries from the menu, causing an unlikely protester to appear

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. When Boyster is in danger, a third arm grows out of his head and saves him. Then, Boyster and Rafik decide to dig a swimming pool for the summer

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Part two of two. After giving their kingdom to Lanny the boys head home to Chicago in a hot-air balloon. However, when the balloon crashes, they realise they have made a terrible mistake

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: After Boomer takes the blame for a note Brady left asking Mikayla for a date, he finds himself being hunted by her father as part of an ancient Kinkowian tradition

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The mall holds a fashion show, and the boys become designers with the help of Isabella and the girls

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys are told about a mysterious pirate named Badbeard while on a camping trip with their grandfather, and decide to set out on a swashbuckling adventure of their own

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: It's a Mud, Mud, Mud, Mud World.
programme.desc: Candace frets about her impending driving test, while the boys decide to build a monster truck

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Dude We're Getting the Band Back Together.
programme.desc: The stepbrothers decide on a great present for their parents' wedding anniversary - persuading the couple's favourite band to reform

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Spider-Man: Web Warriors: Contest of the Champions - Part Three.
programme.desc: In this third of a four-part story Spider-Man, The Avengers and The Agents of Smash battle their greatest foes for the fate of the planet

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Spider-Man: Web Warriors: Contest of the Champions - Part Four.
programme.desc: In this final episode of a four-part story Spider-Man, The Avengers and The Agents of Smash battle their greatest foes for the fate of the planet

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Grandfather tells the boys about a distant relative called Phineastein who created a monstrous Platypus

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys take a tour of the Museum of Contemporary Art and help an artist's son who is trying to paint a desert

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys find an egg and think Perry has laid it, so they build a platypus incubator - but Candace decides to look after it

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys find a way to become part of a video game - and drag Candace in too

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Part one of four. Trapped in the apocalypse and menaced by villains new and old, Dipper finds himself in a race against time

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Part two of four. Dipper, Soos and Wendy set out to save Mabel from a strange new world. Meanwhile, Bill's forces plan their next move

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: The Avengers reunite when Captain America and Iron Man learn to appreciate their differences while trying to save the world from ultimate destruction at Ultron's hands

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.desc: The agents track the Leader to a deserted island, but get stuck in a deadly maze where they are forced to battle the Hulk's dark side - in physical form

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Isabella sends a letter to Phineas admitting her true feelings, then desperately tries to get it back.Doof invents an Unretrograde-Inator

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Doof invents an Inator to make him look like the pizza delivery boy. Candace gets hit by the ray and uses her new appearance as a boy to find out what makes boys tick

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Tales from the Resistance: Back to the 2nd Dimension.
programme.desc: Now that Doofenshmirtz is in jail, Candace is feeling restless. Then a new threat appears in the Second Dimension and she must team up with Phineas and Ferb again to resist it

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel takes match-making too far when she steals a love potion from a real love god to use on Robbie and Tambry. Stan creates a hot-air balloon for the Woodstick music festival

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Pacifica enlists Dipper's help to rid the Northwest Mansion of a ghost before he wreaks havoc on her fancy party. Nathan Fillion returns as Pacifica's father

programme.title: Lab Rats
